00153 void
00154 Comm::listen(struct sockaddr_in &addr, ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr &chf_ptr,
00155              DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00156   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00157   IOHandlerAccept *accept_handler;
00158   int one = 1;
00159   int sd;
00160 
00161   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0)
00162     HT_THROW(Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR, strerror(errno));
00163 
00164 #if defined(__linux__)
00165   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00166     HT_ERRORF("setting TCP_NODEPLAY: %s", strerror(errno));
00167 
00168 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00169   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00170     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00171 #endif
00172 
00173   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00174     HT_ERRORF("setting SO_REUSEADDR: %s", strerror(errno));
00175 
00176   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0)
00177     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_BIND_ERROR, "binding to %s: %s",
00178               InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), strerror(errno));
00179 
00180   if (::listen(sd, 64) < 0)
00181     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_LISTEN_ERROR, "listening: %s", strerror(errno));
00182 
00183   handler = accept_handler = new IOHandlerAccept(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr,
00184                                                  m_handler_map_ptr, chf_ptr);
00185   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(accept_handler);
00186   accept_handler->start_polling();
00187 }

00190 int
00191 Comm::send_request(struct sockaddr_in &addr, time_t timeout,
00192                    CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *resp_handler) {
00193   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00194   IOHandlerDataPtr data_handler;
00195   Header::Common *mheader = (Header::Common *)cbuf_ptr->data.base;
00196   int error = Error::OK;
00197 
00198   cbuf_ptr->reset_data_pointers();
00199 
00200   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, data_handler)) {
00201     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00202     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00203   }
00204 
00205   mheader->flags |= Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST;
00206   if (resp_handler == 0) {
00207     mheader->flags |= Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE;
00208     mheader->id = 0;
00209   }
00210   else {
00211     mheader->id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00212     if (mheader->id == 0)
00213       mheader->id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00214   }
00215 
00216   if ((error = data_handler->send_message(cbuf_ptr, timeout, resp_handler))
00217       != Error::OK)
00218     data_handler->shutdown();
00219 
00220   return error;
00221 }

00246 void
00247 Comm::create_datagram_receive_socket(struct sockaddr_in *addr, int tos,
00248                                      DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00249   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00250   IOHandlerDatagram *dg_handler;
00251   int one = 1;
00252   int sd;
00253 
00254   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) < 0)
00255     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR, "%s", strerror(errno));
00256 
00257   // Set to non-blocking
00258   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00259 
00260   int bufsize = 4*32768;
00261 
00262   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize))
00263       < 0) {
00264     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00265   }
00266   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize))
00267       < 0) {
00268     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00269   }
00270 
00271   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0) {
00272     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_REUSEADDR) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00273   }
00274 
00275   if (tos) {
00276     int opt;
00277 #if defined(__linux__)
00278     opt = tos;
00279     setsockopt(sd, SOL_IP, IP_TOS, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00280     opt = tos;
00281     setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_PRIORITY, &opt, sizeof(opt));    
00282 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00283     opt = IPTOS_LOWDELAY;       /* see <netinet/in.h> */
00284     setsockopt(sd, IPPROTO_IP, IP_TOS, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00285 #endif
00286   }
00287 
00288   // bind socket
00289   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0)
00290     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_BIND_ERROR, "binding to %s: %s",
00291               InetAddr::format(*addr).c_str(), strerror(errno));
00292 
00293   handler = dg_handler = new IOHandlerDatagram(sd, *addr, dhp);
00294 
00295   handler->get_local_address(addr);
00296 
00297   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_datagram_handler(dg_handler);
00298   dg_handler->start_polling();
00299 }

00303 Comm::send_datagram(struct sockaddr_in &addr, struct sockaddr_in &send_addr,
00304                     CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr) {
00305   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00306   IOHandlerDatagramPtr dg_handler;
00307   Header::Common *mheader = (Header::Common *)cbuf_ptr->data.base;
00308   int error = Error::OK;
00309 
00310   cbuf_ptr->reset_data_pointers();
00311 
00312   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_datagram_handler(send_addr, dg_handler)) {
00313     HT_ERRORF("Datagram send/local address %s not registered",
00314               InetAddr::format(send_addr).c_str());
00315     HT_ABORT;
00316   }
00317 
00318   mheader->flags |= (Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST|
00319                      Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE);
00320 
00321   if ((error = dg_handler->send_message(addr, cbuf_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00322     dg_handler->shutdown();

00328 int Comm::set_timer(uint64_t duration_millis, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00329   ExpireTimer timer;
00330   boost::xtime_get(&timer.expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00331   timer.expire_time.sec += duration_millis / 1000LL;
00332   timer.expire_time.nsec += (duration_millis % 1000LL) * 1000000LL;
00333   timer.handler = handler;
00334   m_timer_reactor_ptr->add_timer(timer);
00335   return Error::OK;
00336 }

00382 int
00383 Comm::connect_socket(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr,
00384                      DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00385   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00386   IOHandlerData *data_handler;
00387   int one = 1;
00388 
00389   // Set to non-blocking
00390   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00391 
00392 #if defined(__linux__)
00393   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00394     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(TCP_NODELAY) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00395 
00396 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00397   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00398     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00399 #endif
00400 
00401   handler = data_handler = new IOHandlerData(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00402   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(data_handler);
00403 
00404   while (::connect(sd, (struct sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in))
00405           < 0) {
00406     if (errno == EINTR) {
00407       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00408       continue;
00409     }
00410     else if (errno == EINPROGRESS) {
00411       data_handler->start_polling();
00412       data_handler->add_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY|Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00413       return Error::OK;
00414     }
00415     HT_ERRORF("connecting to %s: %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(),
00416               strerror(errno));
00417     return Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR;
00418   }
00419 
00420   data_handler->start_polling();
00421 
00422   return Error::OK;
00423 }
